{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3408461,"name":"Poyraz Aygül","username":"poaygul","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:17:35.647Z","cooked":"

We’ve been using REV swerves on “high” gear ratio for a while and have experienced many wheels sliding, tearing up, etc. I suspect it may be because of our gear ratio. I also wonder what other teams are using since we can’t do any pushing, defending, etc against any bots with NEO mk4 L2s or L3s. Any info/tips?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:17:35.647Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":102,"reads":211,"readers_count":210,"score":552.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Poyraz Aygül","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60521,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy"},"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/1","custom_user_title":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3408462,"name":"Joseph Walters","username":"Jwal","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:21:27.702Z","cooked":"

Noting this thread as we also used the original “High” gear ratio (not the extended gear ratios released at the start of the 2024 season or just before.

What do you mean by “tearing up”? Are you referencing the REV wheels delaminating/becoming damaged? Or some other wheel tread? Or some other meaning?

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:21:27.702Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":213,"readers_count":212,"score":47.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Joseph Walters","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63541,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408463,"name":"Emerson OHara","username":"Emerson1706","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emerson1706/{size}/174702_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:23:24.167Z","cooked":"

9401 used “extra high 2” with regular NEO v1.1s at IRI with treaded wheels from TTB. TTB wheels definitely helped but they definitely struggled against source defense with such a small wheel/weak traction.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:23:42.548Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":203,"readers_count":202,"score":50.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Emerson OHara","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":43759,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1706 Drive Coach | 9401 Mentor | #TeamThrifty"},"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/3","custom_user_title":"1706 Drive Coach | 9401 Mentor | #TeamThrifty","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408464,"name":"Poyraz Aygül","username":"poaygul","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:25:18.554Z","cooked":"

We used plastics so they would last around 3-4 matches. The TPR tread would snap in some places and wear out a lot.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:25:18.554Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":190,"readers_count":189,"score":48.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Poyraz Aygül","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":63541,"username":"Jwal","name":"Joseph Walters","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60521,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy"},"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/4","custom_user_title":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408466,"name":"Joseph Walters","username":"Jwal","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:31:10.171Z","cooked":"

Just clarifying - do you mean REV-21-3004?

Team537 was a 19.5inx19.5in frame parameter, max weight robot.

Old-Stock V1 wheels we used we experienced delamination and generally excessive damage for only 2 or so matches.

V2 wheels we experienced better wear with the desire to change out wheels at about the 4match mark (due to not having replacements we ended up running much longer), and the only damage we experienced were flat-spots when we had a module azimuth lock up on us.

We are looking at moving to aluminum wheels with tread material or TPU printed tread. We experimented with an early version of TPU printed tread but did not experience good results form that early design. More recent designs appear to have better results. Weather nitrile style tread or TPU is better we have yet to determine.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:32:27.740Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":181,"readers_count":180,"score":56.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Joseph Walters","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.revrobotics.com/rev-21-3004/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"3in MAXSwerve Wheel V2.0 - Plastic - REV Robotics","clicks":12}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":60521,"username":"poaygul","name":"Poyraz Aygül","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63541,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408467,"name":"Poyraz Aygül","username":"poaygul","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:31:40.794Z","cooked":"

Even tho we don’t want to come head to head with other robots, we want to be able to source defence on occasion. Are there any modifications we can do?

We also just bought REV metal wheels and SDS treads so we have more reliable wheels. Would it help the grip too?

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:31:40.794Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":159,"readers_count":158,"score":41.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Poyraz Aygül","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":43759,"username":"Emerson1706","name":"Emerson OHara","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emerson1706/{size}/174702_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60521,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy"},"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/6","custom_user_title":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408468,"name":"Joseph Walters","username":"Jwal","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:39:33.281Z","cooked":"

I suspect this combination is “gripper” than the REV wheels. We had a fantastic experience with black nitrile tread lasting the entire competition only swapping out for playoffs in 2023 on WCP’s SwerveX (4in OD wheels, 1.5in wide wheel). We were able to hold our own/push others if needed, but often we were faster/more agile than others and could avoid interaction if anticipated.

We have yet to implement this tread on Rev 3in OD 1in wide wheels due to human resource constraints.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:39:33.281Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":160,"readers_count":159,"score":37.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Joseph Walters","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":60521,"username":"poaygul","name":"Poyraz Aygül","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63541,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408469,"name":"Poyraz Aygül","username":"poaygul","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:43:06.222Z","cooked":"

We’ve been using V1s for the last 2 seasons. Maybe that was the reason.

Are there any TPU premade designs we could test?

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:43:06.222Z","reply_count":3,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":150,"readers_count":149,"score":45.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Poyraz Aygül","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":63541,"username":"Jwal","name":"Joseph Walters","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60521,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy"},"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/8","custom_user_title":"7840 Driver, Electrical, Strategy","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408470,"name":"Joseph Walters","username":"Jwal","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:57:10.469Z","cooked":"

I think V1 wheels were 50% of your negative experience. V2 wheels were much better but didn’t have the longevity and grip-over-time we were used too in 2023 with our SwerveX modules and nitrile tread.

I think nitrile tread on aluminum wheels will make a significant difference in your experience - that is what we hope for ourselves as well!

3D printed tread - I think this is the longest/best thread on the topic. Many designs and materials to try/have been tried and reported on.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2024-07-15T12:57:10.469Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":148,"readers_count":147,"score":39.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":468695,"topic_slug":"what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on","display_username":"Joseph Walters","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/tpu90a-grippy-tire-cad-published-finally/438075/748","internal":true,"reflection":false,"title":"TPU90A Grippy Tire CAD published (Finally)","clicks":5}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":60521,"username":"poaygul","name":"Poyraz Aygül","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63541,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408471,"name":"Eliot Dunn","username":"Eliot","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/eliot/{size}/207280_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:57:16.895Z","cooked":"

This is the original post with my design:

WildStang Robotics Program: Team 111 and 112 Build Blog - 2024 Open Alliance
TPU Wheels Over the last few months, a team of four students (including me) have been working on making and testing 3D printable wheels for MAXSwerve. FRC team 88 worked on wheels much like these, releasing a design at the end of the 2023 competition season. We saw their design and wanted to try to adapt it to MAXSwerve. Why? Go fast or get passed. These wheels have a special spike pattern that grips into carpet, allowing wheels to achieve a much higher coefficient of friction (COF) than stand…

We switched to tread printed on ttb wheels, this design:

WildStang Robotics Program: Team 111 and 112 Build Blog - 2024 Open Alliance
Wheel Update So, I first wanted to create a poll, because I’m curious how many teams have used our wheel design. I want some numbers I we can point to for awards if possible. poll Now that’s out of the way, onto some durability testing. Before we finished printing the hubs for our TPU wheels, we used molded wheels for a while. We actually ran then until we had shaved about 0.35" off of them. REV has certainly fixed the durability issues on these wheels. [PXL_20240224_213301871] Now, for some…

2024","clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":60521,"username":"poaygul","name":"Poyraz Aygül","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/poaygul/{size}/235100_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52966,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"111 Alum"},"post_url":"/t/what-gear-ratio-do-you-use-your-rev-3in-maxswerves-on/468695/10","custom_user_title":"111 Alum","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3408472,"name":"Emerson OHara","username":"Emerson1706","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emerson1706/{size}/174702_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-15T12:57:58.611Z","cooked":"

fwiw the rev aluminum wheels only have 0.85" tread, while TTB aluminum wheels have 1.00" wide tread. Even said, being on such a small wheel has its limits.

We were able compete a full event in a single set of wheels ~12 matches with some life to spare. We have been very happy with the results of the TPU wheels @Technologyman00 designed.
